A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Multiple climaxes\, should have ended with the first one. Why bring back Luke Skywalker to simply drag him through the mud\, ruin him as a character\, and then throw him in the garbage?\n\nWTF is the point now of the next film? Disney should apologize. Do some re-shoots\, re-cut\, and re-release this. Just pull a mulligan. Ugh.
